name: Halllowmas
description:
in this game you play as a obese skeleton named skulla. that missed halloween and now is
on the mission to kill santa claus and make chrismas the new halloween

note: this is my first game so take it with a grain of salt
so if you say "it's shit" then damn right its shit
but if you some how had fun play this shit obese fetish game
then hey good for you :)  anyways have fun or not.
